question: Dina taun naon "income from operations before income tax" énggalna paling aya?
Apa total beban pajak penghasilan dina juta dolar di sababaraha taun nu ditunjukkeun dina tabel?
Golongan taun na mana pikeun jualan net paling leutik, naon nilai 'net income from discontinued operations ( attributable to ppg )' dina jutaan dolar?
Jelaskeun trend tina 'net sales' tina taun-ended 2011 ka 2013.
answer: Net sales nampi turun sedikit ti $1732 juta dina 2011 ka $1688 juta dina 2012, terus turun tajam ka $108 juta dina 2013. Ieu nyandakkeun trend negatip nu penting, khususna dina taun akhir jangka waktuna.

question: Cikana ngaran ukum panyayian keuangan anu nilaiana dina 2013 leuwih sepuh ti jumlah total nilai dina 2012 jeung 2011?
answer: income from operations before income tax
income from discontinued operations net of tax
net income from discontinued operations ( attributable to ppg )

question: Saha persen ningkatna 'net income from discontinued operations ( attributable to ppg )' tina 2012 ka 2013?

Yén aya 'net gain ti pamisah jeung panggabungan' dina taun 2013 aya 25% leuwih leutik, sareng pangurangan ieu langsung ngurangan 'income from operations before income tax', naon nilai anyar ti income from operations pikeun taun éta?
Berdasarkan data, analisis hubungan antara 'net sales' jeung 'income from operations before income tax' dina tilu taun. Adakah korelasi konsisten?
answer: Henteu aya korelasi konsisten. Tina taun 2011 ka 2012, métrik nempoan korelasi positif, saprak penurunan sedikit dina jualan (tina $1732M ka $1688M) ngajadikeun penurunan dina panghasilan (tina $376M ka $345M). Sanajan kitu, hubungan ieu balik leungeun dina taun 2013, saprak pangurangan gedé dina net sales ka $108M disababkeun ku kenaikan panghasilan ka $2014M. Ieu ngajelaskeun yén dina taun 2013, panghasilan didorong ku faktor séjén tina jualan inti, saprak 'net gain from separation and merger of commodity chemicals business'.

question: Aya metrik panyingsetan anu ngagaduhan nilai '$ 2014' juta dina hiji taun jeung '2014' juta dina dua taun séjén, nyababkeun pangabekuan dina pamformatan data pikeun nilai numeris anu sarua?
answer: less : net income attributable to non-controlling interests discontinued operations
net gain from separation and merger of commodity chemicals business

question: Aya hiji hiji dina baris keu tahun 2013 anu ngajadikeun acara pangpentingna dina hal moneter dibandingkeun jeung nilai implisit nol atawa dekat nol dina taun anu sejenna, sareng ngaranjeungkeun wayah éta nyerang 'income from operations'?
answer: Hijina 'net gain from separation and merger of commodity chemicals business' jeung nilai 2192 juta dina taun 2013 nyaeta acara pangpentingna dina hal moneter. Kajadian ieu kalawan ngora kawangunkeun pangaruh pangpenting dina 'income from operations before income tax' $2014 juta dina taun anu sami, anu jadi anomali nu panggede dibandingkeun jeung $345M sareng $376M anu dilaporkeun dina taun 2012 sareng 2011, sapertosna.

question: Apa ékspénsi pajak pikeun akhir taun 2011?
